lead_paragraph: Yuengling, the oldest brewery in America, is run by a fifth-generation owner: the 71-year-old patriarch of the family that gives it its name. His four daughters are waiting in the wings.

headline.main: Yuengling Brewery Chief’s Daughters Work to Become His Successors

snippet: Yuengling, the oldest brewery in America, is run by a fifth-generation owner: the 71-year-old patriarch of the family that gives it its name. His four daughters are waiting in the wings.
